author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify some of the scripts to enable running the IsoTrack calibration of the  HCAL

#### PR validation:

Used in obtaining the IsoTrack calibration of HCAL

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca230Y Modify some of the scripts to enable running the IsoTrack calibration of the  HCAL
